single_cell_analyzer.membrane_potential_analysis¶

Created on Nov 3, 2012

@author: regger

Functions

PSTH_from_spike_times(spikeTimeVectors[, …])

Calculate PSTH from vectors of spike times with optional bin size and time window [tBegin, tEnd].

compute_mean_psp_amplitude(vTraces, tStim, dt)

compute_uPSP_amplitude(t, v, tSyn[, isEPSP])

simple method for determining amplitude of unitary PSP starting at time tSyn: Determine baseline as median Vm during 10ms preceding the PSP In case of IPSPs set isEPSP=False

compute_vm_histogram(vTraces)

compute_vm_std_windows(vStd, tStim, dt)

simple_spike_detection(t, v[, tBegin, tEnd, …])

Simple spike detection method.

test_spike_detection_respects_threshold()

vm_mean(vVec, tVec, tStim, dtStim)

computes mean subthreshold voltage from voltage trace during stimulation time window [tStim, tStim+dtStim]

vm_std(vVec, tVec, tStim, dtStim)

computes standard deviation of subthreshold voltage from voltage trace during stimulation time window [tStim, tStim+dtStim]

Classes

RecordingSite(secID, segID, label)

light-weight container holding information about recording site: section and segment ID of attached cell, identifier label, and list of recorded voltage vectors

RecordingSiteManager(landmarkFilename, cell)

simple class providing methods to handle recording sites defined by Amira LandmarkSet

SpikeInit()

Provides methods for analysis of spike initiation in in vivo/ in vitro simulations.
